dynamic_line: Hallo, reisendre.  What is it you want?

responses.text: I don't need anything, just gotta got.
I'm sorry, who are you again?
Do you mind if we just talk a bit?

dynamic_line: I'm a wanderer like you who found purpose and a home with the gods.  I'm not who I was, but somebody new.

That purpose is to serve the true lords of this world, and enter Valhalla on some coming day.  There I will not worry about the wandering dead, but see the might of battle and feast with those worthy.  Odin the Allfather will smile on me that day.

This is our holy henge devoted to the gods.  Here we stay between pillaging the ruins of the old world, perform our rites for divine favor, and feast in merriment.  We all help each other in these trying times, united in our divine strength and sharp blades.

responses.text: How could I get in on this?
Enjoy yourself then, I have to go.

dynamic_line: Our leader should be around here somewhere, likely in their hall.  They're the ones who could guide you proper.  Gudene vil det!
Just in time for the party.  Get your sword ready!
I can't believe my eyes.  Thank you, thank you!

responses.text: I want you to follow me.
I want you to stop following me.
